intents.name: DescripcionIntent

can you give me information about Tokyo

samples: What tourist attractions are there in Tokyo

samples: tell me about the gastronomy of Tokyo

samples: what is the typical costume of Tokyo

tell me about the traditional costume of Tokyo

intents.name: PersonajeIntent
samples: what important people there are in Tokyo
who are the outstanding characters of Tokyo
tell me about famous people from Tokyo

intents.name: MusicaIntent
samples: what music is popular in Tokyo
Tell me about traditional music in Tokyo
